text: Benvenuto Cellini (; 3 November 1500 - 13 February 1571) was an Italian goldsmith, sculptor, draftsman, soldier and musician,Benvenuto Cellini. www.worldhistory.org. Retrieved Jaunary 1, 2022. who also wrote a famous autobiography. He was one of the most important artists of Mannerism.Benvenuto Cellini: how the ‘bad boy’ sculptor and goldsmith gives us a fresh perspective on the Renaissance. www.historyextra.com. Retrieved Jaunary 1, 2022. He was born in Florence, and died there.Benvenuto Cellini – Master of Mannierism. scihi.org.
